name: Sajeeva Lakmal
bio: Thaddeus Zambellis is an innovative IT entrepreneur and the driving force behind Outcept, a forward-thinking tech  Specializing in Kubernetes, Thaddeus excels in orchestratingcontainerized applications to enhance scalability and performance.With a deep passion for Python and a keen interest in UIdevelopment using Vue, Thaddeus consistently pushes the boundariesof modern software solutions. Their expertise and dedicationposition Outcept at the forefront of the technology industry.
